goals.title: User Goal
goals.desc: Assist founders in understanding how to create effective UX for landing pages.

goals.title: Business Goal
goals.desc: Gather information about these businesses and their products to generate leads and convert them into potential customers.

discoveryPhase.identification: We analyzed 17 Landing Page projects which showed the trend in businesses requiring guidance and aid in building and re-designing there landing pages.
discoveryPhase.validation: Secondary data collection through Reddit, Quora, and web threads, combined with in-depth user interviews with founders and copywriters, provided insights into the specific challenges founders are facing.
discoveryPhase.analysis: Gathering the insights obtained and performing Affinity Mapping in order to group and categorise the problems.

problemsIdentified.title: Copy writing
problemsIdentified.desc: Framing their story from customer's pov

problemsIdentified.title: Founder's Mindset
problemsIdentified.desc: Confused state, unaware of problems - looking for help, not able to find one

problemsIdentified.title: Guided and personalized Help missing in current market

ideaExploration.analogyUsed: We dived deeper in the problem by building the analogy of how a parent takes their sick child to a doctor

behindTheScenes.naming: Drawing from the doctor-patient analogy, we sought an element that connects both to doctors and landing pages. The "Pill," resembling a "Button," bridges both concepts, leading to the name "Landing Pill" â€“ the solution that cures your landing page issues.

ui.approach: Instead of a traditional website, we opted for a gamified experience. A character, "The Pill" guides users step-by-step in a fun, conversational way. Resources are presented as levels, building trust as users progress.
ui.socialProof: To instill a sense of security and provide social proof, a landing page for the Landing Pill was created. This page outlines the audit process followed by Landing Pill and highlights the value users can expect from the product.
ui.futureScope: The future scope includes Creative Script developing a go-to-market strategy to acquire the first 100 customers and determining how to conduct audits and generate organic leads.

achievements: The Landing Pill is a unique solution that bridges the gap between founders and copywriters, providing a guided and personalized experience.
The gamified experience of the Landing Pill is a fresh approach to landing pages, making it more engaging and interactive.
The future scope includes Creative Script developing a go-to-market strategy to acquire the first 100 customers and determining how to conduct audits and generate organic leads.
